pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, September 16, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and hold a media availability.

Cafeteria
John G. Diefenbaker Building
111 Sussex Drive, Ottawa

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:45 p.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited for the Cabinet retreat.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
